product_name: CliniqueClarifying Face Lotion Toner 4 - For Oily Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique's Clarifying Face Lotion 4 is a dermatologist-developed exfoliating lotion for oily skin. It sweeps away excess oil that can lead to breakouts.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: OilySweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes, and excess oil to reveal smoother, clearer-looking skin.Preps skin for moisturizer - exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.For oilier skin types, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimize excess oil and keep pores clear.Dermatologist developed and testedAllergy testedHow does Clarifying Lotion fit into your skincare routine? Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique’s 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris with Clarifying Lotion makes skin more receptive to moisturizer and treatment products.Key IngredientsBHA (salicylic acid): Helps clear and unclog pores.Witch hazel: Helps refine skin.Research ResultsClinique's Clarifying Lotion face exfoliator instantly delivers clinically proven benefits* for skin that:Looks more radiant.Looks smoother.With less-noticeable pores.*Clinical testing on 31 men and women.Item 2153922How To UseUse exfoliator twice a day, morning and night.Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Alcohol Denat., Salicylic Acid, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA-Copper, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Benzophenone-4, Green 5 (CI 61570).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use exfoliator twice a day, morning and night.Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: I have been using this level for over 3 years. It helps cleaning my pores and reduce my acne. I have gotten my teen age daughter using Lotion 4 as well. I use this after I wash my face and I have to saturate the cotton ball and gently run on my facial skin

reviews.headline: I like it
reviews.comments: this had my face feeling so soft. there is a smell to it but it doesn't last long

reviews.headline: Amazing product, highly recommend. my favorite!
reviews.comments: absolutely wonderful product! I have very sensitive skin and it only occasionally has a mild or minimal redness or sting with it. it does have a heavy alcohol scent but when you see how well this product works none of that will matter to you. not only does it help my EXTREMELY oily skin stay plump but oil free throughout most of the day, it also will help take off any grime or dirt you didn't wash off your face before.  I'm going ro be buying this for the foreseeable future. it is my favorite and the best working skin care product I have.

reviews.headline: So far so good.
reviews.comments: Definitely cleans away excess oil and dirt without drying out my skin.

reviews.headline: I do not recommend to use daily
reviews.comments:
I love the clinique brand and i always go back to the clarifying toner. But unfortunately using it daily twice a day drys my skin out, it causes a burning to my skin. 

Its just not for me. I have been using this product on and off for years.

reviews.headline: This is truly the game changer of the skincare line .
reviews.comments: Have been using this product since 1980 . It is the difference maker. You can use it with any skincare line if you prefer another and you will most certainly see a difference. If you get a chance ask a Clinique consultant to show you a demo of this product. Seeing is believing.

reviews.headline: SLOWLY!
reviews.comments: Ladies & gentlemen...this had ACID in it...a stronger dose of it too...so PLEASE don't just jump in head 1st with this! Take it SLOW, use once every 3 days, after 2 weeks or so, try using once every other day, and go back to every 2 days if need be, figure out what works for YOUR SKIN! Take it slow, or you could cause more damage and chemical burns(the redness & burning and itching some are speaking of). It works, but only works as much as you allow it. Again...SLOWLY, work your way up, some may only ever to use this twice a week and rotate with a gentle toner. GOOD LUCK!

reviews.headline: Never Again
reviews.comments: I used Clinique in my early 20's and decided to try it again in my late 30's. I remember now why I originally stopped using this. It makes my face seem so oily after a couple hours use. Plus, I've broken out. I had my skin under control before using this product. I will be returning.

reviews.headline: Has Alcohol
reviews.comments: This straight up felt like I just dabbed that alcohol solution on my face what you use to clean wounds smh … don't know how it has so many good reviews that I didn't even check the ingredients! Be aware

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This product is great for acne-prone and oily skin. It helps remove residual makeup that the makeup removes missed as well.

reviews.headline: Old time favorite
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for many years. It sloughs off the dead skin after cleansing and leaves my skin bright and ready for moisturizer.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again and again!
reviews.comments: I have been a Clinique girl since I was 20 years old, I'm in my early 40's now, and I still use them!  This is a go to for my very oily skin.  It really cleans it after a day of makeup, dirt, sweat, oil.  Very refreshing.  Follow the rest of the usual three step Clinique system!

reviews.headline: Wouldn't recommend for those with sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I had already left a review after trying this for a couple of days and I really like how it makes my skin feel after using it. It leaves me soft and very clean. I just cannot get past the smell. It literally burns my eyes and I hold my breath to use it. I've now discovered that it's burning my skin as well, and I know this is what's causing it because my skin only gets raspy after using this product. I didn't get this reaction at first but now that i've been consistently using this in my routine i notice the red itchy hive like bumps on my face for hours. My face has always been SO sensitive, so i'm sure this is a factor too.

reviews.headline: Good, but smells so strong..
reviews.comments: I've included this product in my skin care routine and so far I like it a lot. It leaves me feeling clean and soft. However.. the smell. I've never put something that smells so strong on my face. I literally hold my breath to use this and breathe through my mouth.

reviews.headline: Great for oily skin
reviews.comments: I have sensitive oily skin that breaks out occasionally and this exfoliating lotion works wonderfully. It doesn't irritate my skin or break me out. I tried number 3 but it wasn't strong enough for my t zone. The Acne Solutions exfoliating lotion was too strong. Highly recommend this!

reviews.headline: The best toner
reviews.comments: The best cleansing toner I've ever used! Even after washing with a cleanser this toner still finds the dirt per my cotton balls. Great for oily/normal skin. This is a staple in my skin care. Especially during summer!

reviews.headline: Amazing amazing amazing toner!
reviews.comments:
I absolutely love this, your skin feels Soo clean afterwards and makes your skin glow !
 I could wash my face 3 times, and this product will still pull more dirt, it's insane! 
I use this twice/day-morning & night & I have seen major improvement. You must try!

reviews.headline: I have used this product for years
reviews.comments: I have used this product for years approx 27.. I've tried other brands but nothing compares.

media.headline: Yes indeed I would buy it again.
media.caption: Skin feels good

faceoff_positive.comments: I love this product! I have VERY oily skin and have used several toning products. All claim to minimize the appearance of oily skin, but only Clinique has lived up to it's claim. It's the only product that has kept my skin looking oil free throughout the day. I will use this toner forever. It really works.
faceoff_positive.headline: LOVE IT! Best ever toner for Oily Skin

faceoff_negative.comments: Im a red head with fair, sun damaged and sensitive skin. I used this in conjunction with the facial soap and gel lotion. I bought them at ULTA from a rep. for my extremely oily skin. I ended up having my nose peel quite a bit. After talking to Katie online she suggested level 3 instead. I might go to a 3 if you have sensitive skin. Love the face wash and gel though. If your new to this line id suggest talking to the chat. They can help explain the products and best way to use them! I learned so much. I loved how clean my face felt just was to strong
faceoff_negative.headline: Love and Hate
